text: @GeorgeTakei 🤚🏻my sister told me yesterday that her oldest's friends had her convinced her of the "Chinese lab" conspiracy theory. She took care of that quickly. We had a good, long, science-based talk about the more than 500 types of coronavirus we've found in bats WORLDWIDE
